name: dashtoon-assignment
description: - [Link to Web-App](https://crochold.github.io/dashtoon-assignment/) - Closing/ Reloading the page will result in data loss. - Switch between the 2 tabs as needed, **Image Generator** & **My Comic**. - **Image Generator** tab won't accept new requests until the last one is completed. - **Keep** : Adds the image to the gallery, **Discard**: Discards it, **Report**: Reports if the image is dissatisfactory. - Use the gallery (**slideshow**) to browse through (slide/ use dots) the images. Add the current image to the end of the comic using **Add this Image** button. - Remove the last added image from the **My Comic** tab if needed. - Download the comic strip as .png, using **Download Comic** in **My Comic** tab.
